Name: Hope's Farm
About the game: Escape the big city stress and experience the quiet charm of rural life. Match your way through an incredible farming adventure. Grow crops, plant trees, raise adorable animals and customize a wonderful farm. Sell the farm goods through challenging match-3 levels and earn experience points to unlock lots of new items! Complete daily quests and earn rewards. Do you have what it takes to manage a successful farm? Show your farming and decoration skills in Hopeâ€™s Farm.
